query: is it possible to have a virtual walk through of a property using ai
response: Yes, it's possible to have a virtual walkthrough of a property using AI. AI-powered tools create immersive, 360-degree virtual tours, allowing clients to explore properties remotely. This technology is especially useful for out-of-town buyers or those short on time. query: am looking for a nice cosy house to rent in kenya, am alone and dont really need much space. what kind of house would you recommend
response: I recommend a one-bedroom apartment or studio in a safe, convenient area like Kileleshwa or Kilimani in Nairobi. These are perfect for singles, offering comfort without extra space. Expect to pay between KES 35,000 and 70,000 monthly.
